|brand = 96Boards |model = Avenger96 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 588-200 |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->

|flash1type = QSPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q16FWIQ; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC v4.51 |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = SanDisk;SDINBDG4-8G; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 26:D4:3C |oui = 80:1F:12

|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 8-18 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.8 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 8.0 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, via low speed expansion header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,, X12
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 1.4, Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, MIPI CSI, MIPI DSI, UART, I2C, I2S, SPI, GPIO |addchip = 3-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2513B;;1;,,, High Performance HDMI Transmitter;Analog Devices;ADV7513;;1;,,, SD 3.0 Memory Card Voltage Level Translator;Nexperia;IP4856CX25;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM w/EUI-48 Node Identity;Microchip;24AA025E48;;1;,,, 20V 4A Synchro Step Down DC/DC Regulator;Analog Devices;ADP2384;;1;,,, Dual Mode MIPI CSI-2/SMIA CCP2 De-Serializer;STMicro;STMIPID02;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Microchip;MIC2026-1BM;;1;,,, Single Buffer/Driver with Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC1G07;;2;,,, Low Quiescent Current LDO Regulator;Microchip;MCP1702;;2;,,, PMIC;STMicroelectronics;STPMIC1A;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2019 |estprice = 130 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Germany

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata LBEE5HY1MW |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[STMicro]] STM32MP157A Dual Core [[ARM]] :@650MHz (Cortex-A7)/@209MHz (Cortex-M4) *GPU: ''Vivante'' @533MHz (OpenGL ES 2.0) *Storage: 2MB (QSPI NOR) Flash, 8GB (eMMC 4.51) :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: [[Winbond]] 1GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Cypress]] CYW43455 ([[Murata]]) :802.11abgn/ac (1T1R), BT 5.0 BLE *USB: 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB OTG ports *Power Source: 8-18V/3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.dh-electronics.com/index.php/Avenger96 ''Avenger96'' on '''DH Electronics''' Wiki] *[https://docs.golioth.io/hardware/catalog/boards/unverified/arm_96b_avenger96 ''96Boards Avenger96'' on '''Golioth''' Unverified boards] *[https://zephyr-docs.listenai.com/boards/arm/96b_avenger96/doc/index.html ''96Boards Avenger96'' on '''Zephyr''' Supported boards] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/sandwich-style-96boards-sbc-runs-linux-on-sts-new-cortex-a7-m4-soc/ ''Sandwich-style 96Boards SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/02/23/avenger96-96boards-stmicro-stm32mp1-som/ ''Avenger96 96Boards CE Extended Board'' on '''CNX-Software''']
